gallery.title: Gallery Unlocks
gallery.description: In the gallery, you can decide which image to unlock next.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description: All favorited images are displayed directly on your home screen.

titles.title: Select Title
titles.description: Choose your title from your earned achievements and show your progress.

notes.title: Note Mode
notes.description: Use note mode to mark candidates in cells and avoid mistakes.

levelPath.title: Level Path
levelPath.description: Track your progress on the level path and unlock new challenges.

difficulty.title: Increase Difficulty
difficulty.description: Challenge yourself and level up – each level brings more points!

streak.title: Daily Streak
streak.description: Play daily to maintain your streak and collect bonus points.

nakedSingles.title: Naked Singles First
nakedSingles.description: Look for cells where only one number is possible – the easiest start.

hiddenSingles.title: Find Hidden Singles
hiddenSingles.description: Check rows, columns, and boxes: Where can a number only go once?

boxLine.title: Box-Line Reduction
boxLine.description: If a number in a box can only go in one row/column, eliminate it elsewhere.

nakedPairs.title: Use Naked Pairs
nakedPairs.description: Two cells with the same 2 candidates? Eliminate those numbers in the row/column/box.

scanning.title: Scanning Technique
scanning.description: Go systematically through each number 1-9 and check where it's still missing.

xWing.title: X-Wing Strategy
xWing.description: Advanced: Find patterns across multiple rows/columns to eliminate candidates.

breaks.title: Breaks Help
breaks.description: Short breaks increase concentration – you often see new patterns afterward.

skip.title: Don't Get Stuck
skip.description: Stuck? Skip the cell and come back later – it often becomes clearer.

focus.title: Focus & Concentration
focus.description: Sudoku trains your attention and promotes deep concentration.

mentalEndurance.title: Mental Endurance
mentalEndurance.description: Regular practice strengthens patience and improves problem-solving skills.

memory.title: Strengthen Memory
memory.description: Sudoku activates your working memory and keeps your brain fit.

neuroplasticity.title: Promote Neuroplasticity
neuroplasticity.description: New thought patterns while puzzling create new neural connections.

cognitiveReserve.title: Build Cognitive Reserve
cognitiveReserve.description: Regular brain training can slow age-related cognitive decline.

stressRelief.title: Stress Relief & Relaxation
stressRelief.description: Sudoku has a meditative effect and helps you unwind from daily life.

achievement.title: Sense of Achievement
achievement.description: Each solved puzzle gives you a positive sense of accomplishment and motivates you to continue.

flexibleThinking.title: Flexible Thinking
flexibleThinking.description: Sudoku trains your brain to try different approaches.
